attributes.review: this app runs very very slow and there’s so many alerts and texts. I can’t have any peace! And he says TERRIBLE things like “these black people are thugs” “ let’s make America great again” and I said well it was great til you came... so this app should be taken down. I am very disappointed in this app.
attributes.title: wait there’s more

attributes.review: I was just peacefully petting my pet t-Rex letting him watch videos on my phone when all of a sudden I got notifications from my app saying it’s dinoist and then sent a nuke to my house and blew up my pet T-Rex thankfully I had a full set of enchanted diamond armor but sadly we did not collect enough diamonds or xp to make my T-Rex a pair🥺 DO NOT DOWNLOAD IF U HAVE A DINOSAUR OR IF U DON’T WANT A NUKE SENT TO YOUR HOUSE!!!!!!
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!

attributes.review: So before I download this app my phone was fine as soon as I downloaded it it completely crash I am on a new phone right now and I’m out raged. Also I was eating a cheeseburger from McDonald’s and I got this add and it deleted my cheeseburger how does that even happen I want my cheeseburger back #GetMyCheeseburgerBack
attributes.title: I’m furious

attributes.review: This app gave me false hope. i was expecting to be informed of the great deeds trump was going to do for our country, but instead came across an advertisement that which portrayed the image of a mexican family being held hostage by ICE and how i “MUST!” sign a petition to deport all families of mexican descent, back to mexico. incredibly disappointed.
attributes.title: very disappointed.

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded it I got a virus on my phone and I couldn’t close the app.😳 An ad pops up on the screen literally every five seconds and doesn’t let you close it until you download whatever app is being advertised.🙄 I do not suggest this app AT ALL you’ll regret it for the rest of your life.😚
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Downloaded this app last month. Barley finished downloading today. I opened the app and automatically started seeing problems. The app also seemed to make me have really bad luck. Also, since I opened it my phone has been glitchy and keeps shutting off on its own.
attributes.title: Worst app ever !!

attributes.review: Long ago, the four nations lived together in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked. Only the Avatar, master of all four elements, could stop them, but when the world needed him most, he vanished. A hundred years passed and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar, an airbender named Aang.
attributes.title: Just completely not good in any way shape or form

attributes.review: This price of crap glitches all the time and I have the newest iPhone so how is that my phones fault right? I got two bugs in my phone that I had to go and pay to get fixed deal lord. I thought it would help but honestly the internet is just as good. This app should be banned or off the App Store smh
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: The app is so slow and takes forever to do anything. Full of fake news and information that isn’t fact checked. Also there are so many notifications it drained my battery life and my phone just died constantly
attributes.title: So slow

attributes.review:
this app runs extremely slow and never seems to work correctly, also makes my battery die extremely fast and sends me 50-70 notifications a day which are very annoying not to mention also glorifying a man with misogynistic and racist ideals. 
no ❤️ but i fw you for trying 🧚🏽💕✨
attributes.title: ACAB 😘
